title: Storage WG Deputy Lead needed
shortDescription: Joystream Video DAO (https://joystream.org) is actively looking for a Storage WG Deputy Lead
description:
[Joystream Video DAO](https://joystream.org) is actively looking for a Storage WG Deputy Lead to join our [Pioneer Governance App](https://dao.joystream.org) community Storage team.

 
    **Deputy Lead should be willing to learn how to manage Lead's responsibilities, including::** 


    - Maximize the Storage WG scores 

 
    - Ensure that Storage Providers are performing adequately 

 
    - Analyze current storage capacities utilized within the Storage WG and develop steps and processes to improve and expand upon them 

  
    - Prepares weekly reports/plans/summary in a format approved by Council and Jsgenesis
